column4: Is it a little bit bothersome to install Wine on Linux? In my experience, some natural Linux behaviors seems to change.
I recomend playonlinux. www.playonlinux.com. download the latest deb and install it. It is better than the one n the repos
Lol, too late, I installed Wine first, but now I'm installing PlayonLinux.
Thats fine i usually do wone first.  Playonlinux is getting really good lately though.
